com.Cardinal.CommandPackage.Handle.Properties

Class GuildPermissionsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Cardinal.CommandPackage.Handle.Properties.GuildPermissionsManager

  • public class GuildPermissionsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used for handling guild-specific permissions (more specifically, permissions related to commands).
    Author:
    Cardinal System

        private GuildPermissionsManager(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild,
                                CommandRegistry registry)
        Constructs a GuildPermissionsManager for the given guild. The CommandRegistry argument is necessary for loading permissions configurations.
        Parameters:
        guild - the guild.
        registry - the registry.

      • canAccess

        public boolean canAccess(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User user,
                         ICommand command)
        Determines whether the given user can access the given command in this guild.
        Parameters:
        user - the user.
        command - the command.
        Returns:
        true : the user can access the command
        false : the user cannot access the command
